House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00119
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION TO RESOLVE THE SERIOUS NATIONWIDE TRAFFIC PROBLEMS BY URGENTLY GRANTING THE POWER OF TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT AND CONTROL OF NATIONAL ROADS IN THE PROVINCES TO THE OFFICE OF THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNORS
ABSTRACT : Resolves to require the immediate transfer of the traffic management and control of national roads in the provinces to the Office of the Provincial Governor in order to ease the nationwide traffic problems.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-26
